thread.title: Cynthia Brown

author: Cynthia Brown
title: Cynthia Brown
text: I am new to ordering from Chewy. So far I have placed 2 orders and I cannot say enough how FANTASTIC they are. I am owned by 9 ferrets . They love the Furovite and Ferretlax as treats. However my store charges 13.99 for ONE 3oz tube! I took a chance and Chewy has the same brands for a hellavu lot lessğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„. As I said I've ordered twice so far and my order has been delivered in LESS then 24 hours!ğŸ‘ğŸ‘. This is a fantastic company and one that I look forward to continue ordering from in the future. Thanks Chewy! So far I have told all my friends who have pets about you!!!
